activities: Personally identifiable information is information you provide that lets us know specific facts about you so that we can respond to your requests. Depending on the portion of the website you visit and the information you provide, this information could range from your email address, name which you provide in order to receive information from us about certain services, or more detailed personal information when purchasing services from us. Personal information collected on our website is used only to allow us to fulfill your request for services.
